scripts.dev: npx webpack --config webpack.config.cjs && npm-run-all --parallel dev:react dev:electron
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build && npx webpack --config webpack.config.cjs && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.dist:win: npm run build && npx webpack --config webpack.config.cjs && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build && npx webpack --config webpack.config.cjs && electron-builder --linux --x64
